Management 
• Assessment of Severity of Malaria infection 
• Clinical signs of severe malaria include one or more of the following 
o Severe general body weakness 
o Impaired level of consciousness 
o Convulsions 
o Hypotension (Systolic BP< 80mmHg) 
o Respiratory Distress (Acidotic breathing or RR >30 breaths/minutes) 
o Clinically jaundiced 
o Macroscopic Hematuria
